content: I work for PBS Frontline and am developing a feature of user generated media called Your Digital Nation where users around the world can share stories from their digital lives. We would love to hear your thoughts on technology and the military - from training to videogames to keeping in touch with loved ones. The site is pbs.org/wgbh/pages/frontline/digitalnation/participatepbs.org/wgbh/pages/frontline/digitalnation/participate Click "more" for additional suggestions and guidelines, Thank you Ramona Your Digital Nation PBS Frontline This message has been edited. Last edited by: <NEMESIS1960>, Wed 01 April 2009 02:54 PM

title: PBS Frontline Digital Nation: Share your Stories

content: YDN....... if you had read the rules and regs of this place you would have known NO HOT LINKS ALLOWED.... you best edit yours by adding a * or a + in front of it to make it cold... if not the local coppers here will get ya. One Flag......One Heart......One Nation............EVERMORE
